item.title: Transaction Details
item.description:
The transaction details resource provides information on a single transaction within the ledger. The transaction hash provided in the :id argument specifies which transaction to load

URL Template: /transactions/:id

Arguments

name type description example
:id string A transaction hash, hex-encoded 6391dd190f15f7d1665ba53c63842e368f485651a53d8d852ed442a446d1c69a

Example Request

curl TODO/transactions/6391dd190f15f7d1665ba53c63842e368f485651a53d8d852ed442a446d1c69a

Response

This endpoint responds with a single Transaction. See the Transaction Resource Type for reference
